Name: Vylan
About the game: Tile-Based Levels! Puzzle Levels! Vylan is a 100 level tile-based platformer about beating each level under a certain amount of time. The Game 100 Levels. Many Mechanics. Not Super Hard. Tile-based Movement. Platforming Gameplay. Accessibility Options Disabling the timer, allowing you to beat any level in any amount of time. Increasing the amount of time to beat a level.
